analysis.description:
Vitalik2XToken.sellTokensToPot (/unique_chucks/14/0xe601813fc7bbf78bf71e807a1c06697280f5659f.sol#207-218) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amountBeingPaid) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe601813fc7bbf78bf71e807a1c06697280f5659f.sol#216)

Vitalik2XToken.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/14/0xe601813fc7bbf78bf71e807a1c06697280f5659f.sol#253-255) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(owner,erc20.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xe601813fc7bbf78bf71e807a1c06697280f5659f.sol#255)

Vitalik2XToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/14/0xe601813fc7bbf78bf71e807a1c06697280f5659f.sol#323-342)
